text: @Mike_Pence Are you really pro life Mr. Pence? Or are you just pro fetus?  Because kids in cages separated from their mothers, 135,000+ Covid19 deaths, pro death penalty, defunding school lunches, ignoring bounties on our soldiers, and much more tells me otherwise. Who is your God?
